name: Glow & Handsome Instant Brightness Face Cream
description: Glow & handsome instant brightness cream is the perfect addition to a man’s skincare routine. In your busy day, you're exposed to harsh elements all the time, especially the sun and pollution. This exposure can cause dullness and dark spots on your skin. Understanding these challenges that men have to face, our international experts have designed this face cream for men's skin. Its clinically proven formula uses rapid action technology with multivitamin boost and UV filters to give you 5 benefits: sun protection against UV rays, instant brightness for glowing and even tone skin, Skin Clarity by reducing dark spots & marks, Oil & Sweat reduction and long-lasting freshness *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
